DOC.HEADLINE: INSPECTION TAG ' S COLORS DEMYSTIFIED
DOC.TEXT: In the aftermath of Monday ' s earthquake , anyone concerned about the condition of their home or business can look_for placards posted by the city Department of Building and Safety indicating that an inspection has been done . The 18-by-24-inch placards are in three colors : * Green placards indicate it is safe to enter and occupy a building ; * Red placards indicate that the building is unsafe and should not be entered ; * Yellow placards indicate entry is restricted ; occupants may enter at their own risk to gather belongings , but may_not stay and occupy the building . Specific restrictions are indicated on yellow placards . For instance , the restriction may only apply to one part of a building . The placards generally are posted at main entrances .
